sentence_zh_TW: 即使在取得傑出成就之後，保持謙遜的態度是非常重要的，這有助於贏得他人的尊重和合作。
sentence: It is important to remain ______ even after achieving outstanding accomplishments, as this helps garner respect and cooperation from others.

sentence_zh_TW: 一定要選擇可靠的公司來提供服務，特別是在大型項目中，以確保所有的需求得到滿足。
sentence: It is crucial to choose a reputable ______ to provide services, especially for large projects, ensuring all requirements are met.

sentence_zh_TW: 製造高品質的產品時，橡膠材料常常被使用，因為它具備出色的彈性和耐用性。
sentence: In manufacturing high-quality products, ______ materials are often used due to their excellent elasticity and durability.

sentence_zh_TW: 在某些情況下，做出愚蠢的決定會影響整個團隊的表現，因此必須謹慎行事。
sentence: In some cases, making a ______ decision can impact the performance of the entire team, so careful consideration is necessary.

sentence_zh_TW: 當小孩坐在成年人膝部時，他們通常會感到安全和受到保護，這是一種親密的互動。
sentence: When children sit on an adult's ______, they often feel safe and protected, which creates an intimate interaction.

sentence_zh_TW: 實現目標的過程需要付出努力和耐心，這是通往成功的關鍵。
sentence: The journey to achieving goals requires effort and patience, which are essential on the road to ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 在任何聚會中，確保客人感到受歡迎和舒適是主人的首要任務。
sentence: At any gathering, it is the host's primary task to ensure that every ______ feels welcomed and comfortable.

sentence_zh_TW: 在晚餐後享用一道美味的布丁，可以為用餐體驗增添一絲甜蜜，讓人心情愉悅。
sentence: Enjoying a delicious ______ after dinner can add a touch of sweetness to the meal experience and lift spirits.

sentence_zh_TW: 選擇合適的頻道觀看感興趣的節目，可以讓你更好地享受娛樂時光。
sentence: Choosing the right ______ to watch shows that interest you can enhance your entertainment experience.

sentence_zh_TW: 科學家們努力尋找新的方法和技術來發現疾病的根源，以改善人們的福祉。
sentence: Scientists work hard to find new methods and techniques to ______ the causes of diseases and improve human welfare.

sentence_zh_TW: 保持書寫日記的習慣可以幫助我們反思每天的生活，提升自我意識。
sentence: Maintaining a habit of keeping a ______ can help us reflect on daily life and enhance self-awareness.

sentence_zh_TW: 探索不同文化和地理環境的世界可以增進我們的理解和包容，增強彼此的聯繫。
sentence: Exploring the diverse cultures and geographical environments of the ______ can enhance our understanding and inclusivity, strengthening our connections with one another.

sentence_zh_TW: 有時候，獨自享受時光可以讓我們更好地思考生活和個人目標，獲得更清晰的見解。
sentence: Sometimes, enjoying time ______ allows us to better think about life and personal goals, gaining clearer insights.

sentence_zh_TW: 存在的意義常常引發深思，讓我們去探索個人生活的價值和目的。
sentence: The significance of ______ often provokes deep thought, prompting us to explore the value and purpose of our individual lives.

sentence_zh_TW: 在數學課上，瞭解如何處理不同的數字是學生取得好成績的基礎。
sentence: In math class, understanding how to work with different ______ is fundamental for students to achieve good grades.

sentence_zh_TW: 在文檔編輯時，學會如何有效地粘貼文本和圖片可以提高工作效率。
sentence: In document editing, learning how to effectively ______ text and images can enhance work efficiency.

sentence_zh_TW: 在辦公室中，正常運行的印表機對於完成文檔和報告的準備至關重要。
sentence: In an office, a functioning ______ is crucial for preparing documents and reports.

sentence_zh_TW: 在歷史上，許多女人為改善社會做出了重大貢獻，值得我們永遠紀念。
sentence: Throughout history, many ______ have made significant contributions to improving society, deserving of our lasting remembrance.

sentence_zh_TW: 在大型人群聚集的活動中，確保衛生間的整潔和可用性是至關重要的，以保障參加者的舒適。
sentence: In large gatherings, ensuring the cleanliness and availability of ______ is vital for the comfort of attendees.

sentence_zh_TW: 在做出重要決策之前，仔細考慮所有的選擇將有助於避免未來的問題。
sentence: Carefully ______ all options before making significant decisions will help avoid problems in the future.
